item.title: Recursion & DP

item.title: Math, Countings
item.description: Permutations and combinations 지난주 부터 고등학교 수학을 다시 공부하고 있다. EBS인터넷 강의와 Khan Academy의 자료가 큰 도움이 되고 있다. 오늘은 코딩 알고리즘 과제 할때 특히 자

item.title: Becoming a math person
item.description: I decided to become a math person “I’m just not a math person.” We hear it all the time. And we’ve had enough. Because we believe that the idea of “math people” is the most self-destructive idea in America today. The truth is, you probably are
